## NgxPrimerAccordionRootComponent.moveFocusToEnd() method

Moves the focus to the last accordion item in the list.

This method sets the focus to the last accordion item in the list of accordion items. It ensures that the focus is moved to the final item, regardless of the current focus.


**Signature:**

```typescript
moveFocusToEnd(): void;
```
**Returns:**

void

{<!-- -->void<!-- -->} This method does not return any value.
